title: Number of Pokémon GO daily users in the U.S. 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
Month July 19 has the highest Number of users in millions and July 12 has the lowest Number of users in millions.
There is a difference of 24.0 between the maximum Month July 19 and minimum Month July 12.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
Month July 19 has the highest Number of users in millions and July 12 has the lowest Number of users in millions.
There is a difference of 24.0 between the maximum Month July 19 and minimum Month July 12.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of users in millions 45.0 is found at Month July 19 and the minimum is found at July 12 where Month is 21.0.
There is a difference of 24.0 between the maximum Month July 19 and minimum Month July 12.
Month July 19 is higher than any other Months with value 45.0, followed by August 16, and July 14. Down to Month July 12 with the lowest value 21.0.
Overall Number of users in millions has lowered over the Months.
The Month July 12 has 1.49 times less Number of users in millions than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 121.0.
